sledgehammer.test

Class TestModule<M extends Module>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable

    M - The Module being tested.

    public abstract class TestModule<M extends Module>
extends Printable
    Class designed to handle common operations for testing Modules.
